properties.Name_of_th: Anicut and Canal of Mahakumbura Yaaya
properties.Observatio: Although the anicut is in good condition, it is unable to collect water due to bank erosion. The canal has also been developed. 6 acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal.
properties.Descriptio:
Extension of the existing anicut by 1.50 m length,  0.75 m height and minor repairs to the existing anicut

Clearing the site and scarifying the surfaces of the existing anicut

Common excavation for foundation or quarry materials and haul the surplus up
properties.photopath: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MWS003-GIS/MWS003-GIS.github.io/main/IWWRMP/Data/EXD/200_photo/MWS_132/Minor Irrigation - Mahakumbura Yaaya Canal and anicut (4).jpg
